definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

sentences.english: Mother pegs wet clothes on the line.
sentences.chinese: 母親把溼衣服晾在繩上用衣夾夾好。

sentences.english: Also can hang filar towel on clothes tree, secure with clothes-pin.
sentences.chinese: 也可將絲巾掛在衣架上，並用衣夾固定。

sentences.english: You fasten the washing to a line with a peg .
sentences.chinese: 你把洗的衣物用一個衣夾夾在繩子上。

sentences.english: Mother fasten the washing to a line with a peg.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽把洗的衣物用一個衣夾夾在繩子上。
